title: Really nice commons from an old collection ($24-36)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Really nice commons from an old collection ($24-36)
posts.post_content:
Shipping is $3 within the US

Paypal f/f preferred, but MO or regular PP plus 3.2% also fine.

These cards all have one or more minor flaws, but are incredibly nice overall.  They have that bright, shiny look of cards of cards that have been well taken care of.  

Oldring $30 sold
Devore $24

Wow luke these are nice...PM sent
